Holiday travel can be taxing even without the added stress of disruptions such as cancellations flight delays or lost bags PERIOD

Last winter Southwest Airlines holiday travel meltdown left millions of travelers stranded and angry PERIOD Travelers were still filing for compensation for ruined trips weeks later PERIOD Consumer complaints against U.S PERIOD airlines to the Department of Transportation in February  increased sixfold compared with February  forcing the agency to temporarily stop reporting more data as it processes complaints PERIOD

Despite the chaos holiday travel shows no signs of slowing down this year PERIOD About  of Americans plan to pay for flights or hotel stays this holiday season according to a NerdWallet survey conducted by The Harris Poll in September among over  U.S PERIOD adults PERIOD They will be referred to as  holiday travelers going forward PERIOD

More than a third of  holiday travelers  say they will keep their usual holiday travel plans this year regardless of expense PERIOD And given the rising cost of gas a quarter  of those traveling say theyre flying rather than driving PERIOD

If youre determined to get your dose of festive cheer you may wonder if its worth paying extra for travel insurance this year PERIOD The survey found that  of  holiday travelers plan on buying or have already bought travel insurance for their holiday trips up from  last year PERIOD

The postpandemic travel surge is real PERIOD But has the flying experience honestly gotten worse Lets take a look at the numbers PERIOD

The Department of Transportation releases reports on the performance of the  largest airlines and their marketing carriers PERIOD An analysis of data through June  which it should be noted doesnt capture the complete picture of summer travel by the U.S PERIOD PIRG Education Fund found

So while travel returns to prepandemic levels travelers have fewer flight options PERIOD Given those gloomy statistics travel insurance is at least worth considering this year PERIOD

Insurance aside one way to lower the risk of disrupted travel is by adjusting when or how you fly PERIOD Nearly  in   holiday travelers  in the NerdWallet survey plan to avoid busy travel days by extending the duration of their holiday trips PERIOD

 Learn more The busiest days to fly during the winter holidays

The type of insurance you should buy depends on a few factors including

Lets assume youre traveling domestically and already have health insurance coverage PERIOD Depending on your age and health you may not have to pay extra for medical coverage PERIOD Note that only some travel insurance policies cover preexisting conditions PERIOD

Some travel credit cards offer basic trip cancellation or interruption baggage delay coverage and rental car coverage up to a certain dollar amount PERIOD If you think the options your credit card provides are good enough you wont need additional coverage PERIOD

If you dont have a credit card with builtin protection or the limits arent high enough for you look into buying a standalone travel insurance policy PERIOD

You can opt for the trip insurance your airline offers buy it directly from an insurance provider or get it via an online travel agency such as Expedia PERIOD You can also compare quotes from travel insurance marketplaces you can find online PERIOD The cost of your policy will depend on the details of your trip PERIOD

Flying home for the holidays may not get any better this year but having travel insurance could give you some comfort during your trip PERIOD
